alert.note: Alert for Assumption; Lafourche; St. Charles; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Terrebonne (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 7:54AM CDT until May 06 at 8:30AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern St. John The Baptist Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Southeastern St. James Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Southwestern St. Charles Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Northern Terrebonne Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Northwestern Lafourche Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Central Assumption Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 830 AM CDT. * At 754 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Napoleonville to near Stephensville to 14 miles south of Bayou Vista, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Houma, Thibodaux, Lockport, Mathews, Schriever, Paradis, Gray, Des Allemands, Boutte, Supreme, Raceland, Chackbay, Bayou Gauche, Labadieville, Bayou Cane and South Vacherie. This includes Interstate 310 near mile marker 11. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; Lafourche; St. Charles; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Terrebonne
